Naruto nodded and was about to turn to walk inside, but then he remembered something, "Say Kakashi-sensei aren't you going to go and train Sasuke and Sakura for the Chunin Exams? You have been with me for quite a bit." He asked curiously and concerned for his team's readiness to take it, Kakashi thought about the question, well it is true that he is neglecting the giant knucklehead's other teammates and their training due to the situation with Naruto and his growth spurts, but since the seal is in place, he trusts that Naruto won't tamper with the seal, but he's also concerned that he might and something might happen, not to mention that the mysterious third party responsible for making Naruto grow again might still be out there...
1111321221111221211.title: Checking out Naruto's new home

choices: Naruto argues with Sasuke, and realizes they're the same height!
On the way home, Naruto starts getting muscle cramps
1111322.content:
Naruto sighed as he watched the sunrise from the roof of Tazuna's house.

The people of Wave were calling them all heroes. And sure, Naruto was excited; he was thrilled, but he kept thinking about Haku, and that such a good person had died. Maybe, if they hadn't been enemies, they could have been friends. Good ones, too.

Naruto leaned back, wincing as his back and knees popped. If Haku wasn't enough to get him down for long, using the fox's chakra had hit him pretty hard. Ever since the fight two days ago, it seemed like any time he sat still for more than a few minutes every bone in his body would pop when he started moving again. Not just little pops, either, more like something's pulling out on your finger till it hurts kinds of pops. He'd woken up really sore both mornings, and it seemed like the pain was making him a bit clumsy; he'd stubbed his toes three times yesterday, and he kept knocking things over when he was reaching for them.

Kakashi didn't seem worried about that part; he'd just muttered something about 'teenagers' and gone back to his porn. What Kakashi (and Naruto!) was worried about was the seal. Ever since the fight with Haku, the Kyuubi's seal had remained completely visible on Naruto's stomach.

Thinking about it, Naruto puffed his cheeks and gave his belly an angry poke. His stomach rumbled in response; almost like it was angry right back, but Naruto knew that wasn't the case. The last difference he'd noticed since the fight (that he also hadn't really mentioned) was that for the last two days his stomach had felt...weird. It was like he was stuffed full and starving at the same time. He didn't know what it meant, but he figured he'd tell Kakashi about it if it didn't go away by the time his team got home.

Suddenly, Naruto winced and pitched forward, grabbing his right foot. He bit his lip hard enough that he tasted metal, groaning as the pressure came back in his toes, only stronger than it had ever been before.



Inside his seal-space, Kyuubi hummed to himself as he shaped his chakra along the pipes around him. Idly, eyes closed, Kyuubi flexed his paws, claws popping in and out of his toes as he wiggled them back and forth while he gave his chakra a push.

"This little piggy went to market..." He grunted



POP

Naruto stared wide-eyed at his foot as suddenly, his big toe wiggled, popped, and...grew?

Wincing at a slight remaining ache, Naruto quickly brought his feet together, heels touching the roof. His mouth dropped open. The big toe on his right foot had become a big toe; the knuckle on it was almost even with the tip of the same toe on his left foot!



Kyuubi laughed darkly as he felt the chakra moving, the bars of his cage warming up. He'd have to watch that, but the more often he did this the easier it was getting; he'd been at it for days now, and it would only get easier from here.

"These," grunt, "little piggies stayed home...."



POP, pop pop pop!

One by one, Naruto watched as his toes wriggled, snapped, and grew. With a loud pop, the big toe on his left foot shot out to match the right. Naruto grimaced, rubbing the soles of his feet as he broke out in a light sweat. It felt like he had a cramp along the length of his whole foot.



Kyuubi heard the warning hiss from the paper seal. One last push, and he'd have to take a break. Sweating a bit himself, Kyuubi reached with his hand paws and grabbed his own feet, and focused on his chakra. He tugged hard!

"And the piggies...aren't such little piggies!"



SNAP, POP, POP

Naruto gasped as his whole right FOOT jumped, as the toes on his left popped out to bigger sizes. Just as the toes were getting level, his right foot streeetched out, moving the tips of his toes out of reach again. He watched, not surprised, as the left quickly popped out to match.

Naruto sat on the roof for some time, waiting to see if anything else was going to happen. After a few quiet minutes, he gingerly rose to his feet and started walking off of the roof. He stumbled a bit, unused to his own feet, but eventually made it back to his room. At least the pain had mostly disappeared after a while, he hadn't really even felt his feet growing at the end.

Sasuke was asleep, snoring. Most of his friends wouldn't believe that Sasuke snored, but he did. He also drooled, and kicked.

Ignoring that for the moment, Naruto sat down next to his sandals and took stock. Slowly, he slid his foot into the sandal. By the time he got his heel into the back, his toes were completely over the fronts. The whole thing felt a bit tight, but it fit...kinda. Still, Naruto had bought those sandals before the mission, and they'd been slightly big on his feet last week...and ten minutes ago.

Naruto shook his head. Stomach problems, clumsiness, and now his sandals didn't fit. And whatever happened on the roof wasn't normal. He grimaced, and decided to pretend nothing was wrong for now. He couldn't figure out how to bring it up now without Sasuke or Sakura finding out about the fox, and he wasn't ready for that yet. It'd be fine; he'd tell Kakashi when they got home. His feet weren't big enough that his team would notice, so long as he didn't trip a lot or something

Naruto proceeded to dress for the day, planning on hiding the problem with his feet. With that obvious difference, he never noticed that you could see a visible tan line on his ankles where his pants usually rested...about an inch below where they rested now. Or how the sleeves of his jacket weren't baggy or over-long on his arms anymore, but fit perfectly.

He did notice that he'd have to watch his step, as he almost fell down the stairs!



Inside the seal, Kyuubi relaxed...and waited.
1111322.title: Testing...testing

choices: The Chuunin Exams begin, Naruto is 5'6"!
The Chuunin Exams begin, Naruto ducks into the first exam room!
11113221.content:
By the time that Team Seven had made its way back to Konoha, Naruto and the Fox were both in bad moods, though for almost the opposite reasons. Naruto ruffled himself a bit as his orange jacket rubbed at his skin. Normally he'd wear a t-shirt underneath, but he'd had to give that up halfway home; the black shirt he'd brought with him was new, but he'd bought it slightly tight at a discount store, and it seemed the cheap cotton had shrunk after all the dunkings he got in Wave. The last time he'd put it on it felt like it was trying to choke his neck! And since his baggy jacket seemed a bit...less baggy than he expected in places the rougher fabric kept irritating his skin.



Inside the seal, Kyuubi stuck his thumb in his mouth and blew; a rubbery stretching sound echoed out from his cage, and he watched with his extremely sensitive eyes as the walls of his chamber shifted outward a few inches. Outside his cage, the paper seal continued to hiss and spit a bit, pushing back on his chakra. Snarling, Kyuubi stopped with his project for a while.

This was taking forever! It wasn't fair that seals could take him from thousands of feet tall and shrink him into a dozen-plus-whatever inch baby in seconds, and the best he'd managed in days was what...two inches? Maybe a bit more? And when he'd tested going faster with the brat's feet, he'd almost tripped the seal! If he did something to upset the blasted thing it'd force all of the chakra feeders he'd been sending into his jailor's body back into the cage and he'd have to start over!

Kyuubi took a deep breath and forced himself to calm down. Getting angry made his chakra act up, and that made the seal mad. He'd have to think about this logically. The seal didn't like for him to cause Naruto pain, even if the pain was a side effect of...loosely defined 'help.' Some, maybe all of the pain was currently coming from him working against the kid's normal chakra flow and forcing changes where he wanted. He was very limited in how much chakra he could use because the coils he'd managed to tap were tiny, but he'd done that on purpose because he wasn't sure how much the seal would fight him and wanted to keep the flow lower at first.

So, step one, work on a 'lighter' touch with the chakra, maybe try to feel out how the body grew naturally and change his energy to mimic how that looked. Maybe it'd be easier if he did things that the kid wanted to happen at the time; he'd keep an ear to the ground. As for the flow, as the boy grew so would the coils...but...

Kyuubi eyed the pipes leaving his chamber speculatively. Several of the smaller pipes now crackled with red energy, pumping his nutrient-enriched chakra and extending his awareness through the body. But not all pipes were equal, and Kyuubi grinned as he saw a few big ones. Next time the brat called his chakra, he was getting a few of those!



Back outside the seal, Naruto let out a whoop as Team Seven got back into Konoha.

"Let's all have Ramen to celebrate!" He cheered. Kakashi looked bored a life, so no change, Sakura looked a bit interested (SCORE) and Sasuke...

"Tch. I've looked at you enough this month, loser." Sasuke turned and prepared to stalk off.

"Hey!" Naruto shot out a hand and grabbed the jerk's shirt, yanking him back.

Sasuke tensed, starting to resist, but he apparently didn't gauge Naruto's strength accurately as he found himself sliding along the ground until the two were close enough to touch noses.

Naruto glared into Sasuke's eyes, and...wait.

Naruto paused, rant forgotten, and slowly brought his hand up onto Sasuke's head. Sasuke was too distracted for a moment, both by how strong the loser's grip was and by how weirdly soon he ran into the guy's toes, to move. Naruto slid his hand off of Sasuke's head and brought it over to his own. He wasn't hitting air, in fact he'd rubbed his scalp a little!

"YES!" Naruto hopped back (he stumbled a little) and pointed at Sasuke. "In your FACE! We're the same height now, you can't call me midget or shrimp or-"

"I never called you those things!" Sasuke shouted, eye twitching.

"That was me." Kakashi raised a hand, not looking up from his porn as he wandered away.

"Whatever!" Naruto puffed his chest a bit. "Take me seriously! We're a team, and we should eat together! To Ichiraku!!"

Sasuke and Sakura looked at the Naruto-shaped dust cloud for a moment, before Sakura shrugged and started to follow a trail of shoved and irritated-looking people.

"Come on, Sasuke," she called as she walked, "you know he'll just bother us more tomorrow if we don't."

"Hn."


By the time they caught up, Naruto was sitting at a booth and his first bowl was almost ready. The blond kicked his feet back and forth as he perched, eyeing the food like a predator.

As both teammates got ready to order, their jaws dropped as Ayame placed a bowl full of ramen in front of Naruto and he tilted it back and swallowed the whole thing in one go!

Ayame looked a bit shocked, too, but turned without missing a beat.

"That's Naruto for you," she called as she whipped up a second bowl. "He must have missed our ramen; I don't know where he puts it all though! I remember once when he was six he didn't come here for almost three weeks, and when he did show up he finished his first bowl in two gulps. I suppose he has grown a little, since then."

While Naruto loudly protested that he was too growing, and that 'Ayame is mean', Sasuke and Sakura both managed to slowly start eating their own bowls, both instinctively guarding them with their arms from the Naruto-monster.

While they nursed their single bowls, Naruto downed a further two in one gulp each before even slowing down. Even Ayame looked a bit disturbed as he finished bowl 30; she glanced over at the "Most Raman Eaten: 20 bowls! (Naruto Uzumaki)" sign and started looking for a marker.

Finally, after bowl 36, Naruto leaned back and sighed happily, stretching out his arms and back.

pop pop pop
11113221.title: Rivals don't see eye to eye

choices: The Rookie Nine meet MegaNaruto. Hinata gets a nosebleed
Naruto v Lee, the Green Beast chooses a different rival!
111132211.content:
Naruto gingerly climbed out of his new bed, wincing with worry, only to sigh in relief when no popping noises came from his joints, and he felt no soreness. It had been a few weeks since he returned to the village, and since then he'd had to get used to some...changes.

Walking over to the wall in his new room, Naruto took care of step two of his new morning routine and hopped on a medical scale to check his height and weight. Five feet six inches tall and one hundred seventy pounds. No change in two days, but he'd still grown a full head taller and almost doubled in weight since the last time his friends saw him.

Shaking his head to clear his nerves, Naruto tipped up his chin and pointed at his reflection in the mirror and pasted on a feral grin.

"You can do this! They're letting you out today and you'll show the whole world what you can do! Your friends will all be sooo jealous, 'cause they all know how awesome you were at half this size!"

Naruto gave a quick fist pump, thinking he looked like a boss in his new pink and green frog print pajamas.

"Large and in charge, 'tebayo!"

Feeling more pumped up, Naruto thought he might be up to meeting his friends again after all; the Chuunin Exams won't know what hit them!


The last few weeks had been bad, and Naruto missed his team. He missed going outside. The day after he got back in the village, Kakashi-sensei took him to a special room under the Hokage Tower to have his seal checked. Old Man Hokage promised they'd take good care of him, and that they'd even sent for more help from far away, just in case, but that whoever that was wouldn't be there for almost a month.

That first day, everything changed.

Some weirdo Hyuuga was brought in with an ink brush and he stared at Naruto with his creepy eyes for a bit. Then he said that his seal was visible because some of the Kyuubi's chakra had been pulled into it and gotten stuck. Naruto didn't really get how that was a thing, but they guy was supposed to be an expert, and could look at him inside-out, so he asked what he should do.

After talking it out with the Hokage, Hyuuga-moron drew a little on his own hands and fingertips, and then started poking around Naruto's seal. He definitely did something, because the next thing Naruto knew he could swear he heard deep rumbling laughter as his whole body lit up in red and the "expert" was blown across the room and smacked into a wall.

It was only a few seconds before Kakashi slapped some sort of "shut that off!" seal on him, but those seconds...


Back in the present, Naruto pulled out his new outfit, specially made by the Akimichi clan at the Old Man's request, and slipped on his custom sandals. He shook off the memory of his skin stretching, the blood throbbing in his veins as his wiry muscles pulled tight and started flexing, popping out on his frame. The short pain in his feet right before his tight sandals exploded...

There was a knock on the door. As Naruto stood, he heard his sensei through the door, saying something about "cover story," and "keep calm."

The door opened. Naruto stared at his team. His team (except Kakashi) stared at a lot more Naruto than they were expecting.

"Um..." Naruto rubbed his hair sheepishly. "Hi guys. Ready to kick butt in the exams...'tebayo? Eheh.."
111132211.title: Umm....Surprise, 'tebayo?

1111322111.content:
The rest of Team Seven was quiet long enough for Naruto to start feeling uncomfortable again. He shifted his weight a bit as Sakura slowly walked towards him, moving her gaze from his chest, which was nearly eye level to her, down his legs to his feet, and slowly back up until her head was tilted up to look at his face. It was weird. Kakashi-Sensei was still taller, but his team-mates looked kinda...little.

"So," Kakashi called out cheerily as he clapped his hands once, "now that my cute little gennin are all together again-"

"Tch," Sasuke scoffed, turning from Naruto (who was pretty sure Sasuke had been looking him up and down, too) to look at Kakashi.

"So the moron 'finished the totally normal growth spurt he started a bit before Wave'," Sasuke stated in a tone mockingly similar to Kakashi's voice. "What really happened, Uzumaki?"

"Um..." Naruto offered, blinking as Sakura lifted one of his arms so she could press her hand against his; the tips of her fingers touched the bottoms of his.

"Chakra-related accident!" Kakashi offered, beaming, as he casually moved across the room and picked up Sakura, who had moved on to grabbing Naruto's arm for balance and quite easily resting her whole foot on top of Naruto's between his toes and his ankle.

"And that's enough non-consensual groping from you, Sakura!" Sensei continued, setting her back down next to Sasuke. "Let's keep those crazy teen hormones in check, kay?"

"Kakshi!" Sakura screamed, blushing. "It's not like that!"

"He does look really different." Sasuke observed casually, but he looked sort of interested. "How big is he, anyway?"

Kakashi shrugged his shoulders as he gestured the team outside. Naruto didn't need to be told twice, and easily caught up with his team. They wouldn't have far to walk, with Naruto being moved pretty much into the Hokage Tower for quick access and testing. Still, the second he was completely outside, Naruto sighed with relief, smiling up at the clear blue sky.

"Bigger than you, smaller than me." Kakashi answered simply, giving Naruto's hair a ruffle. "Just like almost everybody taking the exams with you."

Naruto batted Kakashi's hand off of his hair, but he grinned a bit, too. He was glad sensei wasn't making a huge deal out of this; Kakashi was too laid back for that, anyway, but it still felt nice. He didn't even really mind getting his hair ruffled; it showed Kakashi was still bigger, and that made him feel a bit less like he'd outgrown his whole life. He couldn't help blushing a bit as he saw his team-mates keep sending him covert, curious glances.

"What's with the new clothes?" Sasuke asked, turning around at the front of the group and walking backwards.

"They're from Choji's family." Naruto answered, patting his shirt self-consciously and eyeing Sasuke a bit jealously. Last time he'd tried walking backwards, he'd tripped over his own feet and crushed his new end table into kindling. It had not been replaced.

"They look pretty good," Sakura offered, smiling. "Do they have a style you like better? I mean, there's still plenty of clothes in regular shops that you could wear, no problem; you're not that tall.

Naruto smiled, glad that his friends seemed to be wrapping their minds around things.

"Some Akimichi clothing is designed to grow with the wearer," Kakashi piped in. "They use it with their techniques. It's sort of like how, if you're careful, you can fit a regular condom over a baseball bat!"

"Pick a better metaphor!" Sakura screamed, as everyone but Kakashi turned bright red.

Kakashi just hummed innocently. Naruto took back every nice thing he'd ever thought about the man, ever; he'd made things awkward again on purpose!


"Yeesh, Sakura, I thought that was you."

Team Seven paused in their walk and looked down a side street, where Kiba, Shino, and Hinata were approaching. Hinata seemed to suddenly stop, like she'd hit a wall, and stared ahead with a stunned look on her face. Shino immediately paused as well, looking down at his frozen team-mate. Kiba apparently hadn't noticed yet.

"Seriously," Kiba continued, rotating his shoulders, "that scream almost sounds like a dog whis- Hinata?"

The Inuzuka boy turned, and slowly waved a hand in front of Hinata's face. Getting no response, he scratched his head and turned to face forward again.

"Hey you guys, do you know what might be...up....with....up?" He trailed off, finally getting a good look at Naruto.

"Hi there, mutt face." Naruto offered, giving a wave.

"What. The hell." Kiba offered, walking slowly up to his old classmate.

Akamaru, perched on Kiba's head, sat up a bit so he could look Naruto in the eye and gave a happy bark.

"Totally normal growth spurt," Sakura, Sasuke, and Kakashi all droned out the answer at the exact same time.

Naruto and Kiba both twitched. Shino started waving his hand in front of Hinata's face, and snapping his fingers.

"Well whatever happened, can I have some?" Kiba asked, looking down with a whistle. "Seriously, you're like, supersized, and you have puppy feet!"

"Um...what?" Naruto asked, glancing down and flexing his toes. Out of the corner of his eye, he saw Hinata walking up, still looking a bit dazed.

"Like Akamaru," Kiba looked up, where his partner obligingly held up a paw. "Akamaru's tiny, but I picked him because he had big paws. It's how you can tell how big a dog is going to be."

"His feet and hands are really big," Sakura offered, looking down at her own hand.

"This conversation is pointless." Shino offered, placing a hand on Hinata's shoulder and starting to lead her on toward the academy. "Why? Because we can all observe Naruto's proportions ourselves, and adjust our tactics should we meet in the exam. Discussing it changes nothing, and could make us late."

Kiba scrunched up his face, but shrugged and glared (up) into Naruto's eyes for a second.

"We're going, but don't think this changes anything. The bigger they are, the harder they fall!" Kiba smirked. "So don't even think about growing into those feet, loser; you'll just make things worse for yourself!"

"Oh yeah?" Naruto shouted, pointing at Kiba (who was also walking backwards, ugh!) "Well, if I fall, I'm gonna fall on you! Yeah! How'd you like that, dog-boy?"

Yes, Naruto thought smugly, he was a genius at witty banter! Don't mess with the master!

"You're just jealous!" Sakura shouted, pulling down on her eyelid.

"Hn." Sasuke offered.

"Besides," Kakashi snapped out his orange book and started reading, "I'm sure Kiba-chan knows what they say about big feet."

Kiba stumbled a bit, staring at Kakashi.

Sakura blushed and started sputtering.

Hinata fainted.

Naruto reached up (slightly) and smacked Kakashi-jerk's head, before stomping toward the academy.

His dumb sensei made it weird again!
1111322111.title: Back out in the big world

11113221112.content:
While Naruto dealt with annoying pervy teachers and freaked-out friends, Kurama had troubles of his own.

In the depths of his cage, the mighty Kyuubi sighed, and scowled. His tails thrashed angrily around, the only limbs that he could move. Wrapped tightly around him like a cocoon was giant glowing tree. With a roar of frustration, he flexed his entire body. Muscles that hadn't even existed before that moment popped out with the strain and he thrashed wildly in his newest, even tighter prison. The branches tying him up creaked under the strain, but held.

Gasping, Kurama let his head sink down, and decided to rest a bit.


He wasn't too proud to admit his own mistakes; he'd overplayed his hand. But...it had been so intoxicating! The complete freedom to push through the seal, filling the brat's entire body, the feeling like he was slipping into a tight, but flexible suit, that unlike this ungodly seal with every push he could feel the body stretch to accommodate him...

His moment of triumph was short. A shock, like a thousand insect stings had struck him after what must have only been a few seconds, and he'd been forced back into the cage. He'd slammed at the bars as the paper seal lit like fire; he'd burned with the backlash as he hit his cage again, and again, until even the indestructible metal of his prison had started to creak and groan. Suddenly, a sapling had burst from the floor of his prison, and bound him tight. He'd snarled, he'd screamed, and he'd cursed. But his bindings would not move.

Now he was outmatched. To get at the boy, he'd have to get past not one, but two barriers! The seal was - to him at least - unbreakable, and while this tree was new, it was absolutely saturated with sage chakra. While Kurama's chakra was vast, the chakra of the world itself was near-infinite, and it made things so durable!

The Kyuubi paused, even his tails still. Slowly, his mouth formed into a grin. He chuckled, slowly he laughed. The branches dug into his ribs a bit, but he didn't care! Oh, those fools; this was perfect.

He'd been learning, after all. The whole time, as that brat tripped over his own toes trying to adapt, Kyuubi had been studying everywhere that his chakra could go; and eventually he could send his chakra anywhere. One of the sad truths he'd had to accept was that his host was made of meat. No matter how much his chakra could help, there was a limit to how much stress, how much weight muscle and bone could bear before his 'gift' would have simply killed the boy. His dreams of returning to his former towering glory, meat suit or not, had died a sad death.

But nature chakra turned muscle into cables, bone to steel, skin into armor. And to stop his meddling, those foolish little monkeys had stuck a tap for the stuff right into the seal with him. All he had to do was work out how to turn it to his purposes.

Kyuubi relaxed further in the prison as he stopped the pointless struggle and forced himself to really think. The seal, and the tree, were perfect prisons. They were designed to stop a biju cold. And he could not find a single weakness in them on that front. Looking down, Kurama considered his (very much reduced) ramen ocean, and got an idea. He idly flexed his arm, watching as muscles that he'd only made up moments ago bunched up, and then relaxed.

He was biju. He was sentient chakra, and bound by those rules. His body was a shell, a hollow construct molded to his will. And as he was, he was powerless.

Slowly, Kurama dipped a tail down into the ramen, and winced as he felt the perfect blend of his chakra with real matter soak up into his body. As the floor drained down to the stone, Kurama felt himself sagging against the tree as he gained mass, became more real and solid than he'd ever been before. Focusing inward, he directed the material based on what he'd learned from Naruto's body. There was a brief, awkward moment when he realized he'd actually be a he, and had to spend some time shuffling his hips to, er, make room. Eventually, he turned his gaze down at the branch crossing his chest...and bit into it.

Chewing, grimacing at the horrible taste, Kurama hoped his plan would work. Unlike that fiasco with those two idiot-warriors long ago, he should have a real, working stomach now. So instead of being held forever, the tree should be digested. Gulping, Kurama lowered his head and took another bite.

Slowly, the taste changed. It wasn't stems and leaves. It was blood, it was meat. It was everything delicious, it was energy, it was life! It was better than he could have hoped; nature chakra contained in itself everything needed for life. If he could only harness this power, he may not be free, but he would never be fully contained ever again!

In the dark space created by the seal, a golden glow began to form on Kurama's navel, in a weird copy of the seal on Naruto's stomach. Golden fire began to flow outward, spreading in thick lines across Kurama's new, solid body. The sage tree creaked, and groaned. Kurama had only chewed through a third of the branches before the rest simply snapped, unable to contain him any longer. Kurama looked down, glancing at his paw next to a print he'd left in the bark from his earlier struggles.

His paw was bigger.

Kurama laughed, bending down and tearing into the tree, ripping out chunks with his teeth, tails wagging madly behind him. Why not, after all? Why should Naruto have all the fun? With a contemptuous flick of his tail, a pulse of golden energy rushed out from his body, slamming into the walls outside his prison. He watched, grinning, as the walls made a loud grinding sound and slid back a few inches. He wondered if the brat would notice a growth spurt that small; it wasn't much compared to what he'd done before. Still, fair warning! And if Kurama was getting bigger too, he'd need a lot more space than he thought!

The seal space filled with golden light, dark laughter, and the sound of chewing.
11113221112.title: It's In His Nature

choices: The rest of the enemy's team appears; ninja fight!
His team already handled the ambush; but they look a bit shorter
111132211121.content:
Naruto huffed a bit as he shuffled into his seat in the testing room (seriously, he knows that the desks were bigger than this before he graduated). It was weird; he'd always wanted to stand out and get some attention, but if one more of his classmates grabbed onto him, did that 'hand from their head to his chest' thing, or just asked 'dude...what have you been eating?' he was planning to go full hermit for a few years. Just until everyone caught back up with him.

Thunk

Naruto winced, cursing a bit under his breath as his knees banged under the table. Fine then, he'd just stretch his legs out and-

Thunk

...and his toes just hit the back of the next row, because of course they did.

He wasn't even the biggest guy in the room! Not even close, really; he seemed to be about level with most of the test takers; teams in their mid-teens with a few years of mission experience. There were large, muscular and/or hairy men (and women) in the room! Naruto was certain now that these were desks from a much younger class. Like, six-year-olds or something. The examiner must be screwing with them.

Naruto watched, impressed and a bit jealous as Hinata daintily sank down into the seat next to his. Sure, she seemed a bit tense, but at last she fit into the furniture. Naruto cleared his throat.

"Ne, Hinata-"

"I didn't look!" The girl blurted out loudly, staring forward with a panicked expression. She quickly went bright red as the other genin in the room all turned and stared at their table.

"Um..." Naruto scratched his head, confused. "That's good, Hinata! Way to not do that, whatever it is!"

He offered her a grin and a thumbs up, and wondered if he should start brushing his teeth with better soap like that green eyebrow kid must. Something industrial, like the stuff you can steal to make your own cherry bombs.

Hinata seemed to calm down by the time the test started, just in time for Naruto to start freaking the hell out. He couldn't figure out a single question! Half of them looked like obscure history trivia, and the rest were math!

Naruto gulped as he tried to read an equation slowly, but the more nervous he got the less of it he could keep straight in his head and the numbers all started swirling around each other and-

Thunk

Naruto froze, all thought leaving his head as he felt his knees whack against the table again; he swore he hadn't moved, and his toes were still jammed up at the front! Slowly, trying not to be accused of cheating, Naruto tried to quietly move his chair back a bit. As he did, he noticed something...weird.

It was like getting over a bad cold and suddenly having your nose open back up, or your ears pop. Naruto was surrounded by...something. The whole room was buzzing with energy, flowing around like water and floating off of the other ninja like steam. There also seemed to be a small tornado coming out of his belly-button. Naruto ignored that last bit for a moment, because the whatever-it-was coming off of the people had feelings attached.

Some of the genin were freaking out just like him; some felt sneaky and confident, and some felt...like he felt when he was pulling a really good prank. Those guys were spread through the room, and that Ibiki guy felt the same way! Naruto narrowed his eyes, wondering if he was getting tricked somehow.

"Na...Naruto," Hinata whispered quietly, nudging her paper toward him. "You can copy off of me if...if you want."

Hinata felt...Naruto wasn't sure. It was nice, but scary and embarrassing and warm and a little queasy. Naruto thought about saying no, but Hinata really felt like she wanted to help him; like taking the help would make her happy, even if it put her at risk.

Naruto copied exactly one question from her sheet, and she did feel happy about it. Of course, then their jerk proctor had to ruin it by saying it was all for nothing! All he'd needed to pass the stupid test was to have enough balls not to cut and run at the first threat of failure! Like that was a problem; he might not have much brains, but he had balls to spare. Naruto didn't even get the point for the question he'd copied, since he got the answer right but was busted for cheating. He was still brooding about it long after he'd squeezed out of the testing table and loped along with the crowd to the second quiz.

It was a shock when a kunai got lobbed at his face...and bounced off.

"Hey!" Naruto shouted, more out of reflex as he picked up the knife. He glared at the proctor lady; Anko-something. "Don't throw stuff! Knives are sharp-tebayo!"

Anko-something did not look impressed when she rushed up to him and yanked the kunai out of his hands.

"If you're not gonna bleed properly, you'd better pay attention, or I'll find something that works." She hissed at him, frowning down at the kunai; it looked slightly chipped, like it had been chucked at a rock a few times.

Naruto did his best to pay attention, but all the new feelings floating around everywhere were super distracting. Sand-ninja-redhead who felt like angry-hunger-manic-lonely, Hyuuga-jerk who was bitter-smug-angry, Grass-lady who felt like nothing...

When his team dragged him off to their starting gate, Naruto hoped they knew the rules and stuff, because he had no idea.

When he felt an enemy ninja try and jump him while he was peeing (who does that?!), he realized his new sense would be super-handy.

When he easily lifted the ninja bodily off the ground with one arm, his hand around the jerk's neck, he realized he'd gotten a lot stronger than he thought.

And when that ninja pulled a hidden sword and then broke that sword on Naruto's arm, Naruto decided to forgive the Kyuubi for turning him into a giant, if these were the side-effects.

Seconds after knocking the enemy ninja out cold, Naruto's stomach let out a ridiculous growl, he felt his whole body give a shiver, and -

Uuuuuurp

Naruto coughed awkwardly and waved his hand in front of his face. Seriously, why did his burp smell like leaves?

Gripping then enemy's entire fist in one hand, Naruto casually dragged him through the brush as he made his way back to his team.
111132211121.title: Feeling Feelings

1111322111212.content:
Kyuubi grinned, his tongue lolling out, as he rolled a bit from side to side on his back. Opening one eye, he looked down the vast landscape that was his torso at his almost spherical gut. A ripple passed through his fur, spreading from his belly-button outward, and he heard an odd creaking sound from his navel. The whole thing pretty much screamed 'Warning: Contents Under Pressure'.

HIC

A massive paw shot up to cover his mouth as he gave a heavy gulp, and slowly moved down to rub along his giant belly as the massive fox winced at the sensation coming from his stomach. He'd really had to dig deep to finish off that sage tree - literally, there was digging. The tree had kept trying to grow back until he got down under the root and found a bit of wood under the main trunk with a glowing green seal on it.

Then he ate it.

HIC

Thunk

Kyuubi grumbled halfheartedly as he felt his feet bump against the edge of his cage. Moving his one-eyed gaze to the increasingly tiny-looking paper seal, he started rolling from side to side, hoping to get his body upright again. His stomach grumbled right back, and seemed to bloat up even larger. Giving up, the growing fox-god took a moment to thank the heavens nobody could see him looking so ridiculous, and leaned backward. Butt in the air, he used four tails to brace the weight of his gut and waved the last five at the cage. A pulse of golden chakra blasted out, filling the chamber, and the rumbling in his belly was shortly drowned out by the groaning of stone sliding over stone and the odd shrieking sound made by growing metal bars.

So, bad news: The tree-thing was still trying to grow inside him, and this constant pressure was reeeealy uncomfortable! He'd have to make sure - HIC - that the brat wasn't suffering like this; might upset the seal.

Good news: Kyuubi sighed as the cage, the floor, and the outer chamber walls all expanded around him. The nature chakra did a real number on him; whatever he'd turned into, his chakra wasn't poisonous anymore, and the seal didn't seem to care how much he pushed out anymore!

Better news: The tree was definitely digesting. Kyuubi was glad; it probably wouldn't keep stretching him out after it was gone, but he didn't want to spend the rest of his existence growing inside a cage that he had to spend all his time stretching to fit him.

Thunk

Of course, a few more thousand feet wouldn't hurt; really, it was only fitting.



Naruto stumbled a bit as he dragged his prisoner along. Sure, the guy wasn't heavy or anything (at least to him), but having extra weight on one side really threw off your balance. Plus, his sandals seemed to have shifted on his feet during the fight. He'd have to adjust them, but if weird enemy ninja were going to attack while he was trying to pee, they definitely wouldn't give him time to retie his shoes!

"Stupid - HIC - ninja-tebayo!"

When he got back to his friends, he saw Sasuke lounging over two other tied-up ninja like a boss, and Sakura rummaging through their stuff. Both turned as Naruto's stomach gave off a loud grumble.

Sasuke shot him a smirk that seemed to falter a bit as he saw Naruto's dragged prisoner, but he just snorted.

"Tch, took you long enough, Dobe. What, can't handle one measly - Did you get taller?!"

Naruto paused, dropped the last guy on his friends (there were some pitiful groaning noises) and sat down to pry off his sandals.

"Huh?" He asked. "Why would you think that? I mean, I think I'd notice, right? My clothes still fit just fine!"

"Aren't those Akimichi clothes?" Sakura asked, hopping over and roughly tying up the third enemy. "They're made to grow, right? Like in Kakashi's...um...metaphor."

The three all turned a bit green, remembering their weirdo teacher's commentary. Naruto felt his whole body shiver; geez, he didn't need that reminder!

"And your sandals aren't." Sasuke added, glancing at Naruto's feet. There were red lines where the sandal straps met skin.

"So?" Naruto asked, jamming his sandals back on roughly, and not wincing because his feet were not bigger.

"Stand up." Sasuke ordered. Sakura nodded along.

"Oh come on guys, again?" Naruto huffed as he hopped up.

"Don't slouch!" Sakura shouted, pointing at his hunched back accusingly.

"We just did this-tebayo!" Naruto exclaimed, standing up straight (he was gonna do that anyway!) and letting Sasuke do the head-to-chest thing again. "I get it, I'm big, you guys shouldn't freak out just because you think - UUUUUURP"

Creak Snap Pop

Naruto winced as he saw Sasuke seem to just...shrink, and felt his sandals (okay, so they were too tight) snap off of his feet.

Nobody said anything for a minute; Naruto just stood there trying to stay very, very calm, while Sakura stared wide-eyed and Sasuke became the first of his friends to try the head-to-ribs thing.

Eventually, Sakura broke the silence, asking a question that Naruto couldn't answer, and really didn't want to hear.

"Naruto, are...are you still growing?"
1111322111212.title: Like a Weed...or a Tree

choices: Doors are going to be a problem
11113221112121.content:
"Hurry - HIC - up!" Naruto called back at his friends as he pushed his way-too-long legs for every extra bit of speed they could give him. Behind and above him, his friends were rushing to keep up like champs, tree-hopping as fast as they could. Naruto would be up there himself if he thought he could trust his balance and knew his own weight, but...

- SNAP -

Naruto quickly shook his head and kept running, ducking slightly as he ran under some lower branches. He couldn't trust his eyes right now; he could have sworn that branch was high enough to run under and it would have been if he were, like, a foot shorter.

So, about ten minutes ago.

It had been a weird day, but Naruto thought the whole 'giant' thing had been fixed! He hadn't grown at all since that creepy-eyed guy had smacked him on the stomach, and Hokage-jiji said it was safe now, so he could join his friends in the exams, and -

HIC

Naruto groaned as he tasted bitter leaves, and felt that odd electric tingle shoot from his stomach out to the tips of his fingers and toes. He winced and shivered as he felt the fabric of his special clothing drag along his lengthening torso, watched the branches above him seem to suddenly drop a little, and quickly caught himself as he stumbled a bit, his larger foot landing a bit further ahead then he'd planned, throwing off his stride.

He'd woken up that morning a scary-tall twelve-year-old, and he was going to bed a freak. He had to be seven feet tall by now; every wave of...whatever that tingling stuff was hit his bones like a sledgehammer, he could feel them pushing out at his skin, pulling at his muscles, and then that weird almost relaxing feeling as everything else caught up and made room...

Gritting his teeth, Naruto focused his chakra, pushing it toward his gut to swirl around the source.

Hold it in. Hold it in. Get to the tower. Hold it...hold it...

He was so distracted he didn't even notice the snake until it had swallowed him. Scared, and cramped, and not sure what the hell had just happened, Naruto threw out his arms and grabbed onto whatever he could. He was somewhere dark, and warm. The walls were smooth and wet, and through them he could feel a harder, rippling structure. He heard something gulp, loudly, and felt a wave of pressure forcing him forward.

Nope. Nope. Nope.

Digging in, Naruto grabbed onto the walls harder, and dug his feet in, wishing he was still wearing sandals for the traction.

The whole area started thrashing around, and he felt like whatever-this-was was also moving back the way he came. Another wave of pressure bore down on him, and Naruto felt himself slide along with it before he could strengthen his grip. His feet were starting to burn, like they were heating up.

He had been swallowed! Naruto focused on the idea, and a brief image of a giant, scaly head flashed in his memory. Did snakes even get that big?!

Naruto groaned as another wave of pressure pushed him toward the creature's...he guessed stomach. Probably stomach. He couldn't get a good enough grip; the walls were slimy and he just wasn't strong enough. Sure, he was the world's biggest twelve-year-old, but compared to this giant tube of muscle his stretched-out twig arms weren't gonna cut it!

At that thought, Naruto's stomach made an odd, grumbling noise, and the pressure in his belly seemed to...stop?

No! Not now! Just when it would be useful to have giant-size super-power giving stuff in his stomach, it goes away?!

Desperate, Naruto reached for the source of the horrible buzzing energy, hoping for just a scrap, something to get him out of this mess...and the energy responded. It flowed like water, smoother than his own chakra, however Naruto asked it. No bone stretching, no stumbling, just...there. It still seemed to bring a new sense of feelings with it, and Naruto could feel that the Snake that ate him was confused, and in some pain, and felt a bit sick. Strangely, the energy he was getting had feelings too; it felt curious, and...amused?

Naruto cried out as an even bigger wave of pressure slammed into him, forcing him to his knees.

"Fine," he growled. "You want tight? I'll give you tight."

Naruto wasn't much for planning, or thinking ahead. Usually he just accepted situations as he found them and ran with it. So if that weird energy was listening to him now, then it was a tool he could use. Probably. Maybe. Anyway this snake-monster was going down!

Slowly, not really sure what he was doing, Naruto tried making the energy...buzz.

Almost instantly, Naruto felt his middle warm up, and felt an odd pressure moving against his skin. The pressure pushing down on him seemed to get easier to carry, and Naruto grunted as he slowly became able to straighten his back. Encouraged, he pulled the buzzing feeling into his legs, and was soon able to straighten his knees. Naruto let the energy fill his body; his skin felt strangely tight on him, but he felt so strong! Pushing out with his arms, he felt the snake start to give a bit under the pressure; had it really almost crushed him before?

Naruto needed a better grip. His finger-bones hummed and stretched, longer and thinner in proportion to his hands. They dug between the rippling walls and held tight.

He needed to brace against the sliding pressure. The floor slid under his feet as they creaked and popped.

He needed to get out. Holding on with his legs and one arm, Naruto wrapped one long-fingered hand around his other bicep and felt a small furnace under his skin. He grinned ferally as his large hand was forced open, the muscle pushing against his palm as hard as granite.

Whatever kind of snake it was, it exploded when it died.

Naruto stood, panting, in a quickly-clearing mist left over by the creature. In front of him, Sakura-chan was sobbing over Sasuke. info.description:
Alright, I figured it was more then enough time for me to create my own interactive. I don’t have very many rules or guide lines but first off, I want this limited specifically to characters within the anime Naruto. Other then that here are so basic rules when adding to my story.

1: First off, please try to be descriptive and explaining, you can never really add to much detail can you?

2: Secondly please try to use proper grammar, I am not a spelling nazi but I would like to avoid text talk and such bs here.

3: This is supposed to be a adult story with adult content, if any children are here they have been warned.

4: Expansion and vore are also allowed, I will also allow limited scat and water play.

5: Only the character you pick can grow/expand

Good additions to the story will receieve gift points of up to Five hundred points!

Please add!
